sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./summary.css" class Summary extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { amountPaid: 0, } this.handleAmountInput = this.handleAmountInput.bind(this) } handleAmountInput(e) { this.setState({amountPaid: e.target.value}) } render() { const { total, tax, discount } = this.props const balance = total - tax - discount const change = this.state.amountPaid - total return (
Balance due

{total}

Show more details
{/*
  • {tax}
  • {discount}
  • {balance}
  • { change < 0 ? "Amound paid is insufficient!" : change }
*/}
) } } export default Summary
